entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
